data.actual_result: The server remains there on the list (It vanishes after you close their profile and open it again)
data.expected_result: The left server should disappear from the list of mutual servers
data.short_description: Left server is displayed on the mutual servers tab of any user's profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Navigate to the 'Mutual Servers' tab of their profile - Right click on any of the mutual servers and leave that mutual server (Do this just via the user's profile)
